name: Tangent Rush
description:
Tangent Rush is a casual game with unique controls and challenging levels.

Innovative controlls
The game is easy to pick up since you will only need your mouse to play the game.

Challenging gameplay
Levels will gradually get harder to beat the further you progress. New obstacles and challenges await you after completing another level. Get used to piloting yourself through the game in new ways.

Get the hang of it
Show us what you got! Break your own records and set your personal best score.

Minimalistic Design
The minimalistic graphics makes the game easy to learn and playable at any time.
